solar-system-threejs

Three.js on Bower

Package three on npm is suggested since Bower is lack of maintenance.

npm i --save three

Official repo: https://github.com/mrdoob/three.js#threejs Official repo is too large on Bower, so I picked files out from that repo.

Current version: r76. In this repo the version in converted to 0.76.0 in semantic version for Bower to recognize.

Usage

bower install --save three.js
